message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to enhance your daily life. With its innovative features and high-quality materials, it's truly a must-have. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $85. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the detailed description. However, $85 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $75 for the product. What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs while still valuing the product's quality, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose an offer of $80 for the product. This is a fair compromise that reflects both the value of the product and your budget considerations.
